about_the_game:
Enter the World Grappling Tournament, where only the fastest and most skilled competitors can claim the top spot! This physics-based grapple platformer puts you in high-speed, third-person traversal challenges, blending grappling hook movement with wingsuit gliding for an exhilarating experience.

Master the Course – Swing, soar, and thread through intricate, linear levels designed for momentum-driven gameplay.

Chase the Best Times – Beat the par times to unlock new levels and earn stars.

Optimize & Upgrade – Unlock new equipment and refine your skills to shave time off your runs.

Climb The Leaderboard – Compete against other players to claim the fastest time
detailed_description:
Enter the World Grappling Tournament, where only the fastest and most skilled competitors can claim the top spot! This physics-based grapple platformer puts you in high-speed, third-person traversal challenges, blending grappling hook movement with wingsuit gliding for an exhilarating experience.

Master the Course – Swing, soar, and thread through intricate, linear levels designed for momentum-driven gameplay.

Chase the Best Times – Beat the par times to unlock new levels and earn stars.

Optimize & Upgrade – Unlock new equipment and refine your skills to shave time off your runs.

Climb The Leaderboard – Compete against other players to claim the fastest time
name: Grapple Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 ／ Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 470 with 4GB VRAM ／ NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 ／ Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700／ NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Equip your Grappling Hook and swing into the action. Master the physics-based movement, upgrade your gear, and utilize different equipment to win the championship! Beat the par times to progress and claim your spot at the top of the leaderboard!
